summary: This is an email from August 12, 2020, where the sender informs 'M' that a plaintiff's attorney representing several Epstein victims wants to connect regarding a victim who is also a defendant in a CFU case. The sender offers to facilitate an introduction.

persons.name: Plaintiff's Attorney
persons.context: Represents multiple Epstein victims and is trying to contact 'M' regarding a victim who is also a defendant in a CFU case; has been helpful in arranging victim interviews.

connections.description: Plaintiff's Attorney is attempting to contact M regarding a shared case involving an Epstein victim/CFU defendant.
Plaintiff's Attorney represents the victim named Mrs. )), who is also a defendant in a CFU case.

keyFacts: A plaintiff's attorney representing multiple Epstein victims is seeking contact with 'M' regarding a victim who is also a defendant in a CFU case.
The sender of the email has previously worked with the plaintiff's attorney to arrange victim interviews.
The email suggests ongoing legal coordination between parties involved in Epstein victim cases and other legal matters (CFU cases).
